snippet.title: A few words about the release - HackeRPG DevLog
snippet.description:
Check out this quick update on the progress of our game development! In this video, we'll give you a sneak peek behind the scenes of the HackeRPG project. If you're interested in game development, this DevLog is for you!
What's with the game? Why it's still not released? What's next?

Steam Page:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2671770/HackeRPG/
